channel.title: Objects?
channel.description: Ok so how do i put objects in places like you can with npcs in the autospawn.cfg?? using pimpscape source if that helps at all

item.title: Objects?
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

search makeGlobalObject( then there will be objects like

makeGlobalObject(3093, 3487, 411, -2, 10);//prayer makeGlobalObject(3095, 3487, 411, -2, 10);//prayer makeGlobalObject(3087, 3488, 7273, 0, 10);//barrows portal 

makeGlobalObject(x coord, y coord, object id, -2, 10);//name of object (doesnt matter, just keeps it organised)

Read full topic

item.title: Objects?
item.dc:creator: @xdragon140 xdragon140
item.description:
@xdragon140 wrote:

i search for that in client.java and this is what i find

public void AddGlobalObj(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) { person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType); } } } } } public void AddObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8)); /*CREATE OBJECT*/ if (NewObjectID > -1) { outStream.writeByte(151); outStream.writeByteS(0); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID); outStream.writeByteA(Face); //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH } outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }

Read full topic
